name: celosia
content:

a plant in the amaranth family that comes from eastern Africa and that has bright red, purple, pink, and gold flowers that are pointed like flames: My neighbour planted a row of celosia to add some colour to his garden bed. In her garden this year, my grandmother is growing celosia alongside her usual zinnias and lavender.
More examplesFewer examplesCelosia grow to about a foot tall, which means they can grow in a pot or container without overshadowing the other plants.
